meanings.definition: A chemical group consisting of a methyl group linked to an oxygen atom.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the structure of the methoxy in the molecule.
meanings.sent2: The methoxy in this compound gives it a unique smell.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous molecule hid the methoxy behind the oxygen atom.
meanings.sent4: Her perfume was like a bouquet of flowers with a hint of methoxy sweetness.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the methoxy group looked like a tiny bridge between carbon and oxygen.
